data.title: I Hate Spending Money. Here's What I'm Actually Buying On Prime Day
data.meta_description: I'm all about actually purposeful buys, at truly solid discounts.
data.text:
I'm all about actually purposeful buys, at truly solid discounts.

I hate spending money. This may seem strange, since I work on as shopping writer, but it makes sense to me: I like finding cost-effective products that will actually make a difference in my and readers’ lives, distinct from shopping just to shop.

Because I dread parting with my money (I have a savings account to build!), I plan to utilize Prime Day to snag items I’ve been wanting for a while, for less — and to stock up on items I regularly use, for cheaper.

Advertisement

My criteria? Items that I’ll actually get a lot of use out of, and which are actually a solid deal.

I must admit, I had a lot of fun hunting around. Here are the picks I’m looking at for Prime Day, below.

HuffPost and its publishing partners may receive a commission from some purchases made via links on this page. Prices change quickly on Prime Day, so keep checking back to see the latest updates. Make sure to sign up for an Amazon Prime account to get the deals.

1

A bestselling sleeping mask with 73,000 5-star ratings (41% off list price)

2

A Kodak portable photo printer (39% off list price)

3

A 22-day supply of Crest 3D Whitestrips (35% off list price)
